TopicTitle: Trials and Tribble-ations compared to our 0.16 situation

Articles.Content: I watched on Syfy, a few days ago, when all the players where trying to download the 0.16 version of the game (me included), an episode of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. It was called Trials and Tribble-ations. The plot i won\'t spoil it here, but suffice to say that tribbles where in that episode. And was ironic, that, like them, we, users from around the world where 'multiplying' without stopping and relentless we were in our action, but without malice, like tribbles do, always...
